---
title: "Describe data"
format: html
editor: visual
---

## Load libraries

```{r}
#| message: false
library('tidyverse')
library('readr')
```

## Load data

```{r}
#| message: false
dat <- read_tsv("../data/02_dat_clean.tsv")
```

## Describe the data

```{r}
ggplot(dat,
       mapping = aes(x = disease_state, fill = gender)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(
    x = "Disease state",
    y = "Cases",
    fill = "Gender"
  )

```
